name: rango
description: RangoJS - a fearless gunslinging Node.js library that brings unmatched speed, precision, and power to API development. With RangoJS, crafting bullet-fast, sure aim, and ace-high APIs becomes an exhilarating adventure. Embrace the wild west spirit of web development and experience the thrill of building robust and lightning-quick APIs with ease.

scripts.major: npm version major -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump version to %s"
scripts.major:alpha: npm version premajor --preid=alpha -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump major version to %s"
scripts.major:beta: npm version premajor --preid=beta -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump major version to %s"
scripts.major:rc: npm version premajor --preid=rc -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump major version to %s"
scripts.minor: npm version minor -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump minor version to %s"
scripts.minor:alpha: npm version preminor --preid=alpha -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump minor version to %s"
scripts.minor:beta: npm version preminor --preid=beta -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump minor version to %s"
scripts.minor:rc: npm version preminor --preid=rc -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump minor version to %s"
scripts.patch: npm version patch -m "feat(version): :sparkles: patch version to %s"
scripts.pre:rc: npm version prerelease --preid=rc -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump version to %s"
scripts.pre:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump version to %s"
scripts.pre:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha -m "feat(version): :sparkles: bump version to %s"
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && npm run package && tsc
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run tgz && tsc -w

author: Mack Ignacio
